Title: What's the difference between "Zombie, Run! Zombie Finder" and "Zombies, Run!"?

history.Text: There are two different augmented-reality zombie games which work on Android devices:1. Zombie, Run! Zombie Finder1. Zombies, Run!It's confusing that they have such similar names.
